feed.title: AnonAddy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AnonAddy: v1.2.2
entry.content:
• Added support for reply-all and CCs #123
  • Added information tooltips for Catch-All columns
  • Added auto-create regex option to usernames and custom domains to allow aliases to be created on-the-fly even when catch-all is disabled #631
  • Added matches regex and does not match regex match options to Rule conditions
  • Fixed #654

entry.title: New release for AnonAddy: v1.2.3
entry.content:
• Added "Last Used At" sorting option to aliases which checks for forwarding, replying or sending activity
  • Increased max custom domain length

entry.title: New release for AnonAddy: v1.3.0
entry.content:
• Updated API auth routes to obtain an API key.
  • Rolled back https://github.com/mewebstudio/captcha as latest release is broken.

entry.title: New release for AnonAddy: v1.3.1
entry.content:
• Moved failed deliveries download endpoint to API for mobile apps to utilise
  • Updated to Vite v6
  • Added Created automatically by catch-all as description to aliases made via catch-all

entry.title: New release for AnonAddy: v1.3.2
entry.content:
• Added option to limit replying/sending to only recipients that are directly attached to an alias (Click "Edit" for any alias in the web app)
  • Added an email notification when a new recipient is added and verified on your account
  • Fixed #714
